name: Glass Cannon (bygodnick, Coumor)
description:
The game is barely functional, will be receiving updates to fix this soon.
(Originally made for Godot Wild Jam #44)

Delve through dungeons and fight various monsters and enemies as you go deeper and deeper to fight death incarnate itself at the very end. Along the way, make decisions on whether or not to keep the power you have, or to increase it tenfold, only for you to become more fragile. The choice is yours.

Originally made for the Godot Wild Jam #44, my team and I tried to make a good game in the 9 days but it kind of fell through, but in the end this is what we have, and hopefully we'll have time to work on it!
